context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Teeth cleaning & polishing,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****** *** ** ****** *********. Since childhood i have been facing teeth issues and have gone through multiple root canal treatment and was scared too this time but Dr.Ritika not only convinced me but also assured me my treatment will be with less pain. And she is doctor with her words I have never seen a doctor being so open , generous, friendly, jolly and professionally best at her work  all at same time , she did my root canal treatment which was with less pain. Teeth polishing and cleaning was also good experience. Best doctor has arrived in town.. i recommend her. She explains the root cause and shares best solution and price
Thank you Doctor ‚ò∫Ô∏è

review:
She is friendly, patient and caring . Her staff is also very cordial and friendly. I am still overwhelmed by the painless treatment of my tooth in the minimum possible time . I would certainly like to go for more follow ups

I wish Dr Ritika and her team all the very best

review: Dr. Ritika is very kind doctor, she had treated RC in a great way, definitely I would recommend her to my family and friends. For me tooth ache is a big problem and treating a patient with sensitive teeth's in a humble way is a great thing.
